pages.text: $(#630000)Items obtained from parasites can be used to create weaponry and armor with special effects.
$(#630000)Each weapon has a unique effect indicated by its description. There are two special ones that I will list here, created via giving an item to a Factory.

$(#630000)The Living Pick-axe is the only dedicated mining tool among the group, breaking parasitic blocks, webs, and foliage substantially faster. It also mangles the armor on any target it is hit with.
$(#630000)This tool is created via giving a Factory a Living Axe.
$(#630000)The Living Scalpel is exclusively used to more lucratively salvage drops from bound Factories. As a result, it doesn't have a Sentient form, nor is it any good for combat.
$(#630000)This tool is created via giving a Factory Infested Soil from a Beckon, or from the Biome.
